mapper.insert: INSERT INTO library (library_id, member_id, game_no, purchase_date, playtime_hours, installed) VALUES (library_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{gameNo}, SYSTIMESTAMP, 0, 1)
mapper.select: select l.*, g.game_title AS gameTitle, g.game_no, -- 추가: 게임 번호 등 필요한 다른 필드 추가 gI.attachment_no AS attachmentNo -- 추가: 이미지 경로 등 필요하면 추가 from library l join game g on l.game_no = g.game_no left join game_image gI on g.game_no = gI.game_no where l.member_id = #{memberId}
